Body:
Description: Hi

We have just enabled Smart Groups in EPP.

We have created a Smart group, and set the Dynamic Rule for a group of computer. We have whitelisted a device against the Smart Group.

How do we view which computers are assigned to this Smart Group

Regards
Next Steps Updated: I explained the customer how the Smart Groups are working and I asked for a meeting in order to discuss further if they have additional questions
What We've Learned Updated: The customer asked how the Smart Groups work
